title: Coalition of 33 States Sues Meta Platforms for Harming Children's Mental Health
text: A coalition of 33 states, along with nine attorneys general (AGs) who filed separate lawsuits, sued tech giant Meta Platforms (META) on Tuesday, alleging the company's social media platforms harm children and teenagers and accentuate a national mental health crisis.

title: Meta's Facebook And Instagram Sued By 41 States Over Claims Platforms Manipulate Children; Billions In Potential Penalties Sought
text: It's the United States vs Mark Zuckerberg over the tactics of social media platforms towards kids, at least the majority of the United States. Forty-one states today are taking Instagram and Facebook parent company Meta to court over strategies they use to capture young people's attention and keep them scrolling endlessly.

title: Dozens of US states sue Meta over harm to children
text: Dozens of US states on Tuesday filed a lawsuit accusing Facebook and Instagram owner Meta of of profiting "from children's pain," damaging their mental health and misleading the public over the safety of its platforms.

title: States sue Meta over alleged harm to children on Facebook, Instagram
text: A group of 41 attorneys general are filing lawsuits claiming Meta Platforms Inc. META, -0.28% built addictive features in its Facebook and Instagram services that harm children. The lawsuits in federal and state courts allege Meta knowingly marketed its products to users under the age of 13, who are barred from the platform by both Meta's policies and federal law.

title: Meta sued by 33 states over claims youth mental health endangered by Instagram
text: Complaint filed in California accuses company of knowingly inducing children and teenagers into addictive social media use

title: 33 state AGs just sued Meta Platforms: find out more
text: Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ: META) is paring back gains at writing after a group of 33 attorney generals filed a complaint against it in a federal court. title: Dozens of states sue Instagram-parent Meta over 'addictive' features and youth mental health harms
text: Dozens of states sued Instagram-parent Meta on Tuesday, accusing the social media giant of harming young users' mental health through allegedly addictive features such as infinite news feeds and frequent notifications that demand users' constant attention.

title: Meta earnings should show continued ad dominance — but a new Apple battle looms
text: Not a change to the iOS system that makes it harder for Meta META, +1.74% to glean personal information about consumers — as Apple AAPL, +0.07% did in 2021, costing Meta billions of dollars in potential advertising revenue — but a head-on collision in mixed-reality headsets that had one Meta worker telling Bloomberg News that the Facebook parent company is in the “afraid of Apple stage.”

title: 2 Robust Technology Infrastructure Stocks To Pounce On Now
text: Technology infrastructure is a vast category encompassing hardware and software components that support and optimize the delivery and utilization of information technology (IT) services. Companies in this category can provide hardware, including servers, storage, and networking equipment to software applications, databases, operating systems, middleware and support.
